title: How to Open Google Chrome Task Manager

steps.title: Download and install Google Chrome.
steps.content: Download and install Google Chrome. You can download Google Chrome either directly from Google or any website sharing the installer.

steps.title: Open Google Chrome.
steps.content: Open Google Chrome. Try going to some websites and opening multiple tabs.

steps.title: Click on the ⋮ button.
steps.content: Click on the ⋮ button. After you click the button, a pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Click More tools.
steps.content: Click More tools . On the pop-up menu, select "More tools" to open a submenu.

steps.title: Select Task Manager from the sub-menu.
steps.content: Select Task Manager from the sub-menu. You now have Google Chrome’s task manager tool open. Another way to easily open the task manager tool is by using the keyboard shortcut “Shift+Esc”; pressing the “Shift” and “Esc” button on the keyboard at the same time. Another way to easily open the task manager tool is by using the keyboard shortcut “Search+Esc”; pressing the “Search” and “Esc” button on the keyboard at the same time.
